revised_title: Proton-Proton and Proton-Deuteron Elastic Scattering Experiments at N.A.L.
tldr: The article discusses a study on proton-proton and proton-deuteron elastic scattering experiments conducted at the National Accelerator Laboratory (N.A.L.). The researchers measured differential cross-sections for these scattering processes at various energies and four-momentum transfer ranges. The study also analyzed the slope parameters and the ratio of the real to the imaginary scattering amplitude, providing insights into the energy dependence of these parameters.
